name: Arachnos_Soldiers.Arachnos_Soldier
display_help: Character with Arachnos Soldier training begin their careers as Wolf Spiders. Wolf Spider characters have a strong mix of Melee and Ranged attacks and strong protective powers available via their power armor. Beginning at level 24, the player has to choose whether he will progress down the "Crab Spider" or "Bane Spider" path. Crab Spiders gain access to the "backpack" and the powerful claw/cone attacks it provides, while the Bane Spider track provides stealth and a stronger focus on melee.

powers.name: Arachnos_Soldiers.Arachnos_Soldier.Single_Shot
powers.display_help: A quick single shot from the Arachnos Sub-machinegun. Extremely accurate. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast

display_info: -7.50% strength to defense for 5s on target

powers.name: Arachnos_Soldiers.Arachnos_Soldier.Pummel
powers.display_help: You can smash your opponents in close combat with the butt of your sub-machine gun to deal minor smashing damage. Pummel has a high chance to disorient your foe for a brief time. NOTE: This power will deal critical damage if used after a successful Placate or while the user is hidden with the Bane Spider Cloaking Device. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast

display_info: Only if hidden or target placated
Only if hidden or target placated
66.00% chance for 3.0 stun for 8.05s on target
66.00% chance for 3.0 stun for 2s on target

powers.name: Arachnos_Soldiers.Arachnos_Soldier.Burst
powers.display_help: Quickly fires a Burst of rounds at a single target at long range. Damage is average, but the fire rate is fast. Can also reduce the target's defense. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Moderate

display_info: 3 ticks of 30.40 lethal damage over 0.7s on target
-7.50% strength to defense for 8s on target
3 ticks of 26.44 lethal damage over 0.7s on target

powers.name: Arachnos_Soldiers.Arachnos_Soldier.WS_Wide_Area_Web_Grenade
powers.display_help: Launches a Grenade at long range from under the barrel of your Assault rifle. It explodes into a field of sticky webs which slow and can immobilize all foes within its radius. Recharge: Slow

display_info: -50.00% strength to recharge for 15s on target
-50.00% run speed, fly speed for 15s on target
10000.00% resistance to knockup, knock for 15s on target
-100.0 knockup protection, knock protection for 15s on target

powers.name: Arachnos_Soldiers.Arachnos_Soldier.Heavy_Burst
powers.display_help: Fires a Heavy Burst of rounds at foes in a long cone in front of the user. Can also reduce the targets' defense. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow

display_info.Effect Area: Cone — 50 ft. radius 30° arc (10 targets max)

display_info: 7 ticks of 8.66 lethal damage over 2s on target
-7.50% strength to defense for 12s on target
7 ticks of 9.04 lethal damage over 2s on target

powers.name: Arachnos_Soldiers.Arachnos_Soldier.Bayonet
powers.display_help: Your weapon includes a bayonet attachment which you can use to stab at your enemies for lethal damage as well as causing them to bleed losing health over time. NOTE: This power will deal critical damage if used after a successful Placate or while the user is hidden with the Bane Spider Cloaking Device. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

display_info: Only if hidden or target placated
Only if hidden or target placated
6 ticks of 6.67 lethal damage over 5.1s on target after 0.5s delay

powers.name: Arachnos_Soldiers.Arachnos_Soldier.Venom_Grenade
powers.display_help: This poisonous grenade causes toxic damage over time and weakens the resistance of all foes within the area of effect. NOTE: If you take this power you cannot also take the Crab Spider version. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

display_info: 5 ticks of 10.92 toxic damage over 4.13s on target
-20.00% resistance to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 16s on target
-40.00% resistance to toxic damage for 16s on target
5 ticks of 7.13 toxic damage over 4.13s on target

powers.name: Arachnos_Soldiers.Arachnos_Soldier.Frag_Grenade
powers.display_help: Launches a Frag Grenade at long range from under the barrel of your rifle. The explosion from this grenade affects all within the blast and can knock them back. Note: If you take this power, you cannot take the Crab Spider version. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
powers.display_short_help: Ranged(Targeted AoE), Moderate DMG (Lethal/Smash), Foe Knockback

display_info: 50.00% chance for 1.2 magnitude knock on target
50.00% chance for 1.2 magnitude knock on target
